name: Bunker (AnaO2008)
description:
The year is 3020. Covid 362 has evolved to cause the rise of the zombie apocalypse. Now you must gather supplies, fight zombies, and build your fallout bunker to survive and send out a call to be rescued. But beware! Weapons are in short supply, and the apocalyptic world is riddled with danger! Can you survive the zombie apocalypse of 3020?

For PC:

WASD or arrows to move, Alt to select/start
